parameters: Spears, huh? You pick one up and give it an experimental stab. Not \fitoo\fi heavy to wield, but since you are a bit on the smaller side, it feels like anyone else using a spear would effortlessly outreach you. Probably not the weapon for you.

Spears, huh? You pick one up and give it an experimental stab. Not \fitoo\fi heavy to wield, but since you are a bit on the smaller side, it feels like anyone else using a spear would effortlessly outreach you. Probably not the weapon for you.
A\..\..\.. whip? Seems like more of a bedroom tool than a weapon.
Oh, I wouldn’t try out the whip, not great for novices.
<CC Face: 1>Do people really use these as weapons?

Oh yeah, if you know what yer doin’ you can wrap the whip around your opponent’s hand and yank the weapon out of it, leaving em’ at yer mercy. What they lack in power they more than make up with in range and utility, but it’s hard to use for a beginner.
Alright then, no whip for you.
Bows, hmm\..\..\.. now there’s an idea, if you can just shoot your foes from far away, you’ll never be in any danger!
You grab the bow and quiver and skip on over to the target range. This should be a piece of cake; the dummies are too close to miss!
You don't even want to look at these stupid bows anymore.
Axes. Why are there two of them though, could someone really swing around two of these at the same time?
You are lookin’ a little confused there, those be throwin’ axes.
Yeh, generally the big burly types with those, not for someone fair as yerself, I’d reckon.
Well, you can’t really deny you aren’t the burly type. Oh well, maybe you can use something else?
Two smaller swords. Interesting, but if you are going to use a sword you might as well start with just one, lest you cut off a finger or something.
Some knives. Looks like you could throw them or stab with them. Seems like a good fit for you, you know you aren’t the strongest guy around, but maybe you can use speed to your advantage.
Alright, you grab the knives off the wall and get into the practice area. First, you should try throwing them at the target.
You don't even want to look at these traitorous knives anymore.

A shield. You suppose you would use this alongside a sword. Sounds like a plan, having something between you and whatever monsters you have to face. You pick it up off the rack\..\..\.. but \fioof,\fi is that thing heavy! Well, maybe you’ll pick it up later when you get some more muscle on you.

There are a bunch of armor sets here, but if you try to put one on\..\..\.. Yeah, just picking up the chest plate of this one makes it quite clear that you aren’t going to be wearing these, way too heavy for you.
<CC Face: 1>Do you have any, like, leather armor or something? Something lighter than this?
Oh, you’d have to speak to Burl, the tailor. I don’t work in leather much.
<CC Face: 1>What about the whip over there?
Burl made it. Get my whips from Burl, I do.
A training dummy. If you find a weapon you like, you can try it out here.
The blacksmith's tools. You don't think he'd be happy if you took them off the wall and started swinging them around.
The blacksmith's tools. You don't think he'd be happy if you took them off the wall and started swinging them around.
Some sword racks. That seems like a good place to start, how hard can it be to swing a sword?
You grab a sword and head over to the practice area.
You don't even want to look at these traitorous swords anymore.
Some sword racks. That seems like a good place to start, how hard can it be to swing a sword?
You grab a sword and head over to the practice area.
You don't even want to look at these traitorous swords anymore.

You can’t believe you weren’t able to use \fiany\fi weapon at all. Sure, you’re a bit on the smaller side, your father always did the heavy lifting around the farm, after all, but still, you’d never have thought you’d be this remarkably bad at fighting. As you finally give up and head out the door, the blacksmith calls out to you.
Look lass, I dunno why your heart is set on being a fighter, but if you’re going to try yer hand at adventuring, you’re better off giving magic a try.

You shoot a glare at the blacksmith, before storming out the door without a word, and start wandering aimlessly around town. So that’s why he was so sure you’d fail, he thought you were a girl! Though you’re sure plenty of girls have had better luck than you just had\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1>This isn’t fair, how am I ever going to be strong enough to fight those bandits if I can’t even swing a damn sword right!

Eventually, you stop your brooding, and look up to realize you’re standing in front of the Sorcerer's Cauldron, the local magic shop. It’s getting rather late at this point, but there is light coming out of the shop’s window, so you assume it must be open. Normally you wouldn’t have any reason to enter a magic shop, but the blacksmith’s comment did give you an idea, one last shot at becoming an adventurer. If you can’t fight with physical weaponry, you might as well try out magic, though you can’t say you’ve ever heard of a male sorceress before.
No, there's got to be \fisomething\fi you can wield\..\..\.. right?

There are a bunch of armor sets here, but if you try to put one on\..\..\.. Yeah, just picking up the chest plate of this one makes it quite clear that you aren’t going to be wearing these, way too heavy for you.
<CC Face: 1>Do you have any, like, leather armor or something? Something lighter than this?
Oh, you’d have to speak to Burl, the tailor. I don’t work in leather much.
<CC Face: 1>What about the whip over there?
Burl made it. Get my whips from Burl, I do.

There are a bunch of armor sets here, but if you try to put one on\..\..\.. Yeah, just picking up the chest plate of this one makes it quite clear that you aren’t going to be wearing these, way too heavy for you.
<CC Face: 1>Do you have any, like, leather armor or something? Something lighter than this?
Oh, you’d have to speak to Burl, the tailor. I don’t work in leather much.
<CC Face: 1>What about the whip over there?
Burl made it. Get my whips from Burl, I do.

There are a bunch of armor sets here, but if you try to put one on\..\..\.. Yeah, just picking up the chest plate of this one makes it quite clear that you aren’t going to be wearing these, way too heavy for you.
<CC Face: 1>Do you have any, like, leather armor or something? Something lighter than this?
Oh, you’d have to speak to Burl, the tailor. I don’t work in leather much.
<CC Face: 1>What about the whip over there?
Burl made it. Get my whips from Burl, I do.
The blacksmith looks focused on his work at the moment, you should just pick up a weapon and give it a shot.
You've tried everything you think you have even a chance of using, there's no point staying here any longer\..\..\..
Ya know, I love your enthusiasm on the swords here, but yer girlfriend is lookin’ mighty bored just waitin’ over there.
Oh! I totally forgot to grope you! Come here \N[2]!

Katie runs up, \fbfirmly\fb squeezes your rear, making you let out a little \C[27]“Eep!”\C[0] of surprise, before running back to the sword she was looking at. The blacksmith gives you a look of disbelief—which you suspect you share—before coming back to himself, and coming over to whisper to you.
I know this ain't none of my business, but are ya sure you should be with a fella like him? Doesn’t seem to know a thing about how ta treat a lady, if ya ask me.
<CC Face: 1>\fiU-Um,\fi it’s alright, do you know an adventurer named Katie? Blonde hair, blue eyes, probably just as excited about swords as this guy?
Oh ya, that’s the girl with the fine lookin—ahem, yer pardon. But yes, I know her, what of it?
<CC Face: 1>Well she decided to dress up like a boy and take me on a date, so here we are.
T-That’s?\| Oh, yeah, I can see it now. Still doesn’t explain the way she squeezed yer rear though\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1>She seems to think that’s how guys behave on dates, or something. I don’t know, she’s having fun, so whatever.
Katie spends some more time ogling swords, before she finally grabs your arm and carts you out of the shop.
Alright, next stop, the tailor! I’m going to check out all their new armors and—
<CC Face: 1>Um, Katie? Are we going to actually do anything\..\..\.. like, together?
What do you mean? We just looked at swords for like an \fihour!\fi
<CC Face: 1>No, \fiyou\fi looked at swords for an hour. I don’t know anything about swords, nor am I interested in them, so I just sort of stood there, until you groped me.
\fiHmmm\..\..\..\fi I see what you mean. What, then, would be a good place for us to visit, where I can grope you as I see fit\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1>I don’t know if that last part is really—
I know! We can go see a magic show!
Yeah, come on, are you telling me you’ve never seen one before?
Well then that’s perfect, come with me!
You are dragged by a very excited Katie to some sort of theatre. You didn’t know Elmgar had one of these, to be honest.

The attendant gives her an odd look, but just sighs and gives her the tickets in exchange for a few coins. You don’t know how many, and you don’t need to know, since Katie is paying for them. She then leads you into a small theatre room, dimly lit with some glowing purple spheres. The seats are tiered somewhat, but it’s almost completely empty, so you can probably get some good seats in the front. You move to do exactly that, when Katie grabs you by the arm and drags you to a seat at the very back.
Ah, ah, ah, I paid for the tickets, and I shall decide where we sit!
<CC Face: 1>Well if you’re in charge of picking, why pick the worst seats?
What do you mean, these are the \fibest\fi seats. There’s nobody behind us to see what we are doing\..\..\..
Oh. Right. Katie just wants to grope you.
<CC Face: 1>You know, I actually kind of want to watch the show\..\..\..
Sure, sure, it’s not like you have any groping to do, just relax and enjoy the show. And try to keep your cute little whimpers down.
She slid her hand down the front of your \V[54] while you were talking, and started squeezing your soft penis. She also slides a hand up to cup your \V[62], while forcefully kissing you as well.
<CC Face: 1>There’s no way, \fimph,\fi I’ll be able to, \fimwah,\fi focus on the show while you keep, \fimmph,\fi kissing me!
\fiShhhh,\fi keep it down baby, I’ll go easy on you once the show starts, but for now there’s nothing to do but play with you.

Luckily, at that moment, the show starts. A woman comes out onto stage in a fancy red dress, which is low cut without being overtly sexual, though it shows off her ample cleavage quite well. You think Katie read your mind, or may well have punished you simply for the existence of a woman with big breasts, for the moment she comes on stage she sharply pinches your nipple, drawing another whimper from you. The woman begins with a short intro, before she starts casting some rather interesting spells. You tense up when she first starts chanting, expecting her to burn the place to the ground even though you can’t make out her words, but she just creates a bunch of bright, multicolored sparks in the air, which are quite dazzling.

The rest of the show follows suit, with her creating vibrant images by mashing different colored little sparks together in the air, before they shimmer and dissolve into nothing. She even tells a short story, the usual dragon kidnapping princess bit, but with the extra visuals of a dragon breathing fire shimmering out over the seats, it’s rather captivating. Almost captivating enough to ignore the fact that Katie has been jerking you off this entire time. Almost.

You turn over to give her a genuine answer, and see that she’s pulled her pants and underwear down to show off her wet pussy to you as she uses her other hand to play with it. You notice she still has on a pair of pink boyshorts, despite her disguise.
Hey, why don’t you suck on it a little?
<CC Face: 1>How am I supposed to watch the show if I have my face in your crotch?
Ah, don’t worry about it, the dragon is the best part. Besides, I payed for the ticket, I kind of think you owe me, don’t you?
The look on her face is absolutely insufferable, but suffer it you do, as you lean down and start to eat her out.
\fiMmmh,\fi yeah, just like that sweetheart. Here, why don’t you get down on your knees for me baby?

You do as requested, with a sigh, and get down before her with your face pressed into her crotch. You’ve decided this mediocre date doesn’t deserve your best efforts, so you just lazily lap your tongue up and down her entrance, while she holds you firmly against her crotch.
Oh yeah, just like that. Look up at me baby, yeah, keep looking at me while you do it.

You look up at her, and are surprised at just how much this is turning her on. She’s trying to play it cool, but she’s already panting, and is very flushed. It encourages you to give her your full attention, fluttering your tongue against her and licking deeper inside her, gently brushing against her sweet spot now and again with your nose.
Fuck yeah baby, I’m gonna cum, swallow it all you nasty bitch!

That last part came out a bit loudly, and Katie seems to realize that as she covers her own mouth while cumming into yours. Your face gets a good coating of her fluids as she squirts, her hips lightly bucking as she bites down on her finger to avoid making too much noise. You obediently swallow everything that ends up in your mouth as Katie comes down from her orgasm, before she pulls you back up to sit beside her.
That was super fucking hot, but people are starting to look, so try to act natural.

You flush red, and then try to wipe Katie’s juices off your face, as you try to avoid making eye contact with anyone. Unfortunately, the actress herself locks eyes with you, right as she sprays a bunch of white sparks in an arch towards you. It could just be a normal part of the show, but the smirk on her face tells you it isn’t, as you look away in embarrassment. It shouldn’t make a difference, but you feel even sluttier knowing she thinks you were going down on a guy, if her cum spray is any indication.

The show otherwise ends shortly after, without Katie playing with you anymore, despite the fact that you didn’t end up cumming yourself. Katie quickly tugs you along as you leave the theater, probably to avoid the other people inside.
Well, that was amazing, even better than the blacksmiths, if you ask me. And I even managed to leave you sexually frustrated, despite what you said before.
<CC Face: 1>Well, I mean, if we are breaking character now\..\..\..
Nope, this date is officially over. I’ll keep you frustrated to keep you coming back for more.
With that, Katie gives you a peck on the cheek, and skips off. Well, she seems rather happy with herself, so you suppose that’s good enough for you. She’d better get you off next time though\..\..\..
\C[2]You've become even more submissive towards Katie.
Now, I don't mean to be rude, but\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1,7>There's no way I could wield that massive thing. I'm not sure I could even lift it\..\..\..
\fiYeah.\fi Don't feel bad though, only the strongest men can really use a beast like that.
